oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Qa'a (hall) of Osmân Khatkhuda house

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Collector's note: Osman Katkoda Ka'a côté sud après trav. Hall of Osmân Khatkhoda. Translation of collector's note: Osman Katkoda room South side after works.

halls (interior spaces)
oai_dc:dc.dc:date: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
